segment.source: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0

segment.source: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0

segment.source: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0

segment.source: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) captures and centralizes application settings and Windows operating system settings for the user.
segment.target: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) captures and centralizes application settings and Windows operating system settings for the user.

segment.source: These settings are then applied to the different computers that are accessed by the user, including desktop computers, laptop computers, and virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) sessions.
segment.target: These settings are then applied to the different computers that are accessed by the user, including desktop computers, laptop computers, and virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) sessions.

segment.source: UE-V offers settings synchronization for common Microsoft applications and Windows settings.
segment.target: UE-V offers settings synchronization for common Microsoft applications and Windows settings.

segment.source: It also delivers user settings at any time to wherever users work throughout the enterprise.
segment.target: It also delivers user settings at any time to wherever users work throughout the enterprise.

segment.source: UE-V allows administrators to specify which application settings and Windows settings roam.
segment.target: UE-V allows administrators to specify which application settings and Windows settings roam.

segment.source: UE-V helps administrators to create custom settings location templates for third-party or line-of-business applications that are used in the enterprise.
segment.target: UE-V helps administrators to create custom settings location templates for third-party or line-of-business applications that are used in the enterprise.

segment.source: User Experience Virtualization delivers an enhanced user state virtualization experience.
segment.target: User Experience Virtualization delivers an enhanced user state virtualization experience.

segment.source: It provides consistent personalization of the user’s settings in the following scenarios:
segment.target: It provides consistent personalization of the user’s settings in the following scenarios:

segment.source: Roaming user application and Windows settings between computers.
segment.target: Roaming user application and Windows settings between computers.

segment.source: Roaming user settings between the instances of an application that are deployed by using different methods:
segment.target: Roaming user settings between the instances of an application that are deployed by using different methods:

segment.source: Installed applications
segment.target: Installed applications

segment.source: Application Virtualization (App-V) sequenced applications
segment.target: Application Virtualization (App-V) sequenced applications

segment.source: RemoteApp (Remote Desktop Virtualization) applications
segment.target: RemoteApp (Remote Desktop Virtualization) applications

segment.source: Recovering settings for a computer after replacement, hardware upgrade, or reimage.
segment.target: Recovering settings for a computer after replacement, hardware upgrade, or reimage.

segment.source: This product requires thorough planning before you deploy it or use its features.
segment.target: This product requires thorough planning before you deploy it or use its features.

segment.source: Because this product can affect every computer in your organization, you might disrupt your entire network if you do not plan your deployment carefully.
segment.target: Because this product can affect every computer in your organization, you might disrupt your entire network if you do not plan your deployment carefully.

segment.source: However, if you plan your deployment carefully and manage it so that it meets your business needs, this product can help reduce your administrative overhead and total cost of ownership.
segment.target: However, if you plan your deployment carefully and manage it so that it meets your business needs, this product can help reduce your administrative overhead and total cost of ownership.

segment.source: If you are new to this product, we recommend that you read the documentation carefully.
segment.target: If you are new to this product, we recommend that you read the documentation carefully.

segment.source: Before you deploy the product to a production environment, we also recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test network environment.
segment.target: Before you deploy the product to a production environment, we also recommend that you validate your deployment plan in a test network environment.

segment.source: You might also consider taking a class about relevant technologies.
segment.target: You might also consider taking a class about relevant technologies.

segment.source: For more information about Microsoft training opportunities, see the Microsoft Training Overview at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=80347.
segment.target: For more information about Microsoft training opportunities, see the Microsoft Training Overview at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=80347.
